website_summaries.verdict: With few technical differences between the A8F and the newer and slightly better-looking A9F MASTER Series and a significant price drop between them, this is definitely an attractive smart TV worth your consideration.
pros: Smart TV powered by Android TV
Beautiful 4K HDR OLED display with impressively realistic color and sound
Since it is the 2018 model, it's more affordable than the A9F
Syncs with iOS and Android devices
cons: 2018’s top of the line Sony smart TV is still an expensive investment

website_summaries.verdict: Vivid 4K images and rich sound land this slim model on our shortlist. Built-in Wifi is a major plus other models lack.
pros: An updated OLED TV with a slim build
Offers impressive images with sharp clarity and stunning contrast
Owners also rave about the sound quality
cons: The browser could be more intuitive

website_summaries.verdict: Although the price is high, this Sony TV is worth a look if you want a large screen, amazing picture quality, and an advanced motion rate. This TV puts you in the action.
pros: Offers picture quality that has been described as stunning thanks to the 65-inch screen, 4K Ultra HD resolution, and OLED technology that produce clear images, realistic colors, and exceptional contrasts
120Hz refresh rate is enhanced by the brand's Motionflow XR technology
cons: Some issues with the Android OS have been reported, including slow update downloads

website_summaries.verdict: This super-thin TV hangs nicely on the wall like a piece of art, but it does not come with the option to look like art when it is turned off.
pros: Comes with a built-in Android Google Assistant
cons: This TV is smart enough to work with Google Assistant
However, the actual remote that comes with it is nothing special

customer_reviews.title: Worst TV I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: The first TV lasted 8 months then died... Sony sent a referbished... yes referbished tv to satisfy their "warranty"... The new tv arrived January 4th 2019 and by January 30th it won't power on... Sony support is the worst as I'm trying to get a THIRD TV... DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Excellent television
customer_reviews.text: Only thing negative about this tv is the sony remote. It is not an IR paired remote so you have to aim it at the tv, I installed the provided remote sensors and they stopped working after a day. Picture is excellent. And it handles motion better than any of my friends televisions. I game in it for hours at a time and don’t see this “burn in” that other people talk about with oleds. Other high end televisions ive purchased I woukd have to mess with the settings to get a picture I found to be satisfying, but this one is great right out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: It’s hard when you see a nice Samsung 75” on sale for half the price
customer_reviews.text: I’m still deciding if it was worth $3k. It’s hard when you see a nice Samsung 75” on sale for half the price, but the picture quality of this Sony OLED 65” is intensely great. Rented a 4K movie from Family Video and it was just like being at the movies. A quality sound bar is also a must have for a great movie night experience.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Everything you'd expect from on OLED TV and more!!
customer_reviews.text: Super clear picture and the ability to put your cable box and 4K player behind the TV and control it with the Sony remote!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No ac cord!
customer_reviews.text: Been waiting for this tv for the longest time and when I finally got it, there was no power cord. I could not believe it! How could you not include such an important piece. The worst part is that I had already installed it and it was ready to go. Fortunately, I called amazon and they are sending me another one but I have to return this one so I have to wait even longer now.
customer_reviews.author: ivan diaz

customer_reviews.title: FOR THOSE WHO DESERVE THE BEST!
customer_reviews.text: The video of the A8F is incredibly refined. The point of paying more for the Sony is their microprocessor/operating system. The realism/depth/richness of image is something to behold & easy on the eyes...experience counts! Even the audio is good when properly adjusted. Owning this TV will increase your quality of life.
customer_reviews.author: David&Joyce Koppele

customer_reviews.title: Great TV Destroyed My Furniture
customer_reviews.text: This expensive TV has cheap, compressible rubber feet attached by round phillips head screws that protrude and chewed up the brand new dresser that I bought to use as a stand for the TV. Sony customer support offered no compensation. Beautiful sound and picture, but one star for destroying an expensive piece of furniture and Sony’s refusal to take responsibility for their defective design.
customer_reviews.author: Ian Crosby

customer_reviews.title: One of the best.
customer_reviews.text: I love the picture and vivid colors, and I love the many options this tv has. If your ify about let tell you you won’t regret it, Dolby Vision is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: JAVIER J VEGA

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful TV
customer_reviews.text: Everything about this TV was as expected. Wonderful. Reason for the Star deduct is they did not include a power cord. I recall someone else saying this in a review. That person on the packaging line must have been sick a day or two. If I didn't have another sony tv to steal the cord from, I would have been really upset. And it was not an exact match, but it worked.
customer_reviews.author: Mahoney Law Office

customer_reviews.title: Best TV Picture ever
customer_reviews.text: Best Picture Color and Detail ever. Sound is decent. But who would ever buy this TV without a superior Sound System to go with it?
customer_reviews.author: D. Quicker

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. I turned the brightness all the way down (to prevent burn-in) and use it as computer monitor. I set the computer power option to turn off the display after 10 minutes of idle--again out of burn-in paranoia. I've had this for 10 months and there's zero burn-in (and I use this thing constantly). Only issue I've had thus far is sometimes it doesn't seem to listen to Alexa, but no big deal there.
customer_reviews.author: illuzion30

customer_reviews.title: stunning beautiful picture
customer_reviews.text: i replaced my 13 year old sony lcd with this tv! i'm no expert but i have brightness set on 30, peak brightness is 50 and this tv is plenty bright in my living room! the pictures in 4k are stunning! once you start watching it you can't take your eyes off of it! the picture is also fantastic in 1080 hd as well. Once again sony has excelled with this tv!
customer_reviews.author: rickyeasterling

customer_reviews.title: Stunningly Vibrant Color!
customer_reviews.text: I took advantage of a great price on a 2018 model, thank goodness! My existing setup includes a small hutch to house a wireless box, small bluray player, etc.: this model still comes with a pedestal which fit perfectly on my hutch! All the newer TVs come with weird, wide-set legs that won't work in my situation. This was xmas gift for my wife in our bedroom; I still watch most of my TV downstairs and overtime I come upstairs and see the Sonys' picture I'm stunned at the absolute black background and the electric, luminous colors. This OLED model scored near the top of CR"s ratings and I can see why.
customer_reviews.author: GuiTim

customer_reviews.title: The Biggest Advancement in TV Picture Quality Since HD
customer_reviews.text: This is the most amazing TV and monitor I have ever used. I have a 27 inch 1440P monitor, but the black levels on this TV put it to shame. I really have a had time wanting to use anything other then this TV for gaming. I’m pretty sure I am not going to be able to buy another non-OLED TV or monitor after this.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Henry

customer_reviews.title: Great TV for under $1,200
customer_reviews.text: It is a great TV if you can buy it for under $1,200 - it is easy to set up and the picture quality is good. I use my Bose system for audio but have I tried the TV audio and it sounded better than your typical TVs. So far (3 weeks) I have no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Balancesheet

customer_reviews.title: Sony xbr55a8f
customer_reviews.text: The Sony oled a8f is a great tv. It is easy to set up and connect. Wish the remote was lighted but the tv’s processor makes up for it by making old tv shows look better than new.
customer_reviews.author: William F. James

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: Excellent picture and all the functionality we want. Can’t do better for the price. We purchased this TV 6 months ago and we are still happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Just Me

customer_reviews.title: An amazing tv.
customer_reviews.text: It's picture and sound are fabulous and it looks great even when it is off. I haven't used Voice Recognition so didn't rate that.
customer_reviews.author: Grateful reader

customer_reviews.title: Broken one month out of warranty
customer_reviews.text: This tv broke last night. One month beyond the standard warranty. Buy at your own risk.
customer_reviews.author: Allen

customer_reviews.title: Sony is the best
customer_reviews.text: Sony does it again, QED picture is the best, sound (off the screen) ingeniously performs, best Sont TV ever!
customer_reviews.author: R. Shigemura

customer_reviews.title: Nice Picture
customer_reviews.text: For my room size this 55" is perfect. The picture is the best thing about it. There were some concerns about glare with shades open. However, the picture holds up well in the day time. I would recommend this tv to others.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Fontana

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up.
customer_reviews.text: It has a great picture but ,it is a little dark,looks good at night or if the shades are drawn.
customer_reviews.author: mark s.

customer_reviews.title: Exceeds expectations
customer_reviews.text: This television exceeded expectations for picture quality and overall quality.
customer_reviews.author: Dean W. Clark DDS

customer_reviews.title: Great TV for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great tv even has Dolby vision and hdr 10 support great tv for the money wouldn’t buy anything else
customer_reviews.author: Dawayne

customer_reviews.title: Awesome TV for the price.  A true bargain!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic TV at a great price. 2018 Model saved me significant $$$ over 2019 model. Would buy this TV again in a heartbeat.
customer_reviews.author: Mark C. O'Connell

customer_reviews.title: Picture perfect
customer_reviews.text: Excellent picture quality. Have not used sound as I have a independent sound system. Perfect blacks.
customer_reviews.author: jordan devine

customer_reviews.title: Great Picture with impressive sound
customer_reviews.text: Item is a must have if your budget can handle!
customer_reviews.author: Mariana

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The very best T.V. I have ever bought. The picture is just brilliant. thank you
customer_reviews.author: SMK

customer_reviews.title: The Design and Oled 4K Screen
customer_reviews.text: Si the Best of The Best, excelente color and te acustic surface sound like the Best sound Bar.
customer_reviews.author: Henry E. Vogeler S.

customer_reviews.title: Highest quality, unbelievable value
customer_reviews.text: My 2nd one in 2 yrs. 1st so good, buying 2nd @ huge discount a no brainer. Get it before it’s discontinued. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: RCB

customer_reviews.title: Finally in the 21st century!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love the tv , sound, picture, ease of set up. I didn’t get it from amazon, bought on Best Buy website, picked it up at their main hub for Md, Dc area. Easily mountable very late for that size under 45 pounds. I had a Panasonic 50 inch plasma from 2005, best rated HD at the time. This tv is going from dial up internet to gig downloads, I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: John seaton

customer_reviews.title: Pricey, but worth it in the long haul.
customer_reviews.text: Love this TV. Don't listen to the other person saying you cannot use it for standing, it does stand 90 degrees and works just fine. The clarity is amazing and sound is good too! OLED TVs, unlike traditional LEDs, work in both dark and light rooms, plus no back light! Bought mine at Best Buy because of their 24 months no interest financing.
customer_reviews.author: RC

customer_reviews.title: Blacks and darks lack detail. Overall dark screen
customer_reviews.text: I bought it. Had it for a day and returned it. It’s just not the tv for me. It does have very vibrant colors. But the the tv overall is very dark and it doesn’t matter how you adjust it. To me the blacks are perfectly black but lack detail in the black. Over picture image just doesn’t add up to the Samsung I ended up with. I would say the Sony would probably be great for action movies and cartoons. But than again I could get a plasma for that. I like a sharp lifelike image. To me Samsung nails that.
customer_reviews.author: Louis Bucci

customer_reviews.title: Current owner of Sony A1E (2017 model). Moved that ...
customer_reviews.text: Current owner of Sony A1E (2017 model). Moved that into a different room to make room for this. Contemplated between A8F and another OLED, ended up with this model. Noticeable picture quality and sound quality. Have it hooked up to Apple 4K TV, blu-ray and sound system. The color really pop.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Freeman

customer_reviews.title: Advertising is built into Android TV
customer_reviews.text: Advertising is built into the operating system that you can't turn off or remove
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: truly stunning picture
customer_reviews.text: This TV is not my first Sony, but is my first Sony in a while, and wow had I forgotten how great their picture quality can be! Whether I'm enjoying a British baking show or a fun home makeover, the colors are bright and the movement smooth. My husband leans more toward dark action movies and here the TV really shines with crisp blacks and graded shadows. The sound quality is great as is the interface with my various streaming devices. After years of inexpensive big box TV brands, this Sony has spoiled me for anything else!
customer_reviews.author: C. Quinn

customer_reviews.title: Can see game of thrones on it!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing. Android TV is awesome voice recognition is great. I have absolutely zero complaints. I waited forever to replace my panasonic plasma because no led could come close to the picture quality and motion control. This 4k oled blows it away. I was even able to see perfect in the game of thrones episode the long night that everyone was complaining they couldn't see anything. The price is more than justified I would even pay more if I had to.
customer_reviews.author: penname

customer_reviews.title: Best oled tv.
customer_reviews.text: If you like a sharp pix with image detail & sharp edges, great color with natural skin tones, best up scale in the business with no shadow detail issues(ABL) with all the advantages of oled than Sony oled is for you.If you don't then buy a LG.Keep in mind that calibration is important.Have had a 2016,2017 & tried a 2018 lg oled & returned the 2018 lg oled for a 2018 sony oled, what a big difference .
customer_reviews.author: eric

customer_reviews.title: Movie Screen Quality Experience
customer_reviews.text: I dislike hype - I distrust "new" - so I didn't really expect "OLED" to be any big deal. Boy was I wrong. This TV makes every single thing we watch - shows/movies/streaming/etc. an intensely lifelike experience. It's simply remarkable. Expensive - and worth every penny
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan S Sayles

customer_reviews.title: This is one cool TV
customer_reviews.text: WOW! This television is incredible! I'm not a tech guy, but it only took about a half an hour to get the old TV off the stand and this one set up, a power cord and three HDMI cables for all the different gear, cable, Blu ray, and XBox. A Philipps screwdriver is the only tool needed for assembly, a total of eight screws to secure it to the stand. Then everything is at your fingertips. The graphics are clean! I mean the definition is absolutely clear. The Sound is incredible. The screen is actually a speaker which is just awesome. Can't believe how crazy this is. This is one cool TV.
customer_reviews.author: Bror Erickson

customer_reviews.title: Love this TV
customer_reviews.text: I got this TV from Best Buy when I was looking for an UHD tv for my living room. There was an LG OLED tv next to the one I was going to purchase, and fell in love with the picture quality. The clerk told me that this Sony XBR55A8F was the best overall as far as image clarity, and when I compared the two, Sony was clearest picture by far. OLED is the next level in image quality and Sony is the #1 overall. The speakers in the television will blow you away also!
customer_reviews.author: Lithium Ghost

customer_reviews.title: It have been delivered.
customer_reviews.text: It took a while, but it was delivered today and everything now is fine.
customer_reviews.author: Rating

customer_reviews.title: Good picture, not like I can use it though
customer_reviews.text: If you want to spend all day calling Sony because your tv doesn’t ever work, then this is the product for you. The settings change to kick you off the WiFi, apparently you can’t just plug in a sound bar and have to have tech set it up. Completely to complicated for me
customer_reviews.author: Sternz93

customer_reviews.title: Worst TV I have ever Owned
customer_reviews.text: Sony exchange my xbr65ax1 and gave me a horrible set with banding and poor HDR The banding is so horrible I see it in content all The time, I was totally screwed by Sony, they took a decent set and gave me garbage
customer_reviews.author: Gadget lover

customer_reviews.title: Jaw dropping picture, Incredible sound, High class design and it’s a SONY
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about this TV, did I say like, I mean LOVE. Only TV that’s better is the a9g master. Sony Rocks!
customer_reviews.author: rachard gloudeman

customer_reviews.title: I almost felt it is a worse than my previous 55 inch Pioneer plasma TV
customer_reviews.text: I have to say I am not blown away by this, although I confess its early days yet. In fact the regular HD programs on dish satellite, I almost felt it is a worse than my previous 55 inch Pioneer plasma TV. I have watched one 4K DVD, Bladerunner 2049 on sony ux700 player, its good but again not blown away. Also using 4k apple tv This is early review, I apologize, will update if things feel different. This tv is in my exercise room, one thing thing is certain, with the current experience, I am putting of replacing my main living room 65 inch tv Will appreciate comments regarding tweaking the settings
customer_reviews.author: Saumitra Biswas

customer_reviews.title: Wall mount only. Do not buy this tv if you plan to use the stand.
customer_reviews.text: Stand is not 90 degrees. Disappointed as I understood stand issue was fixed for 2018. It isn’t.
customer_reviews.author: Monkeyranaway

product_meta.title: Sony XBR65A8F 65-Inch 4K Ultra HD Smart BRAVIA OLED TV (2018 Model)
product_meta.description: Size:65-Inch| Style:TVPower and finesse. Sony’s A8F BRAVIA OLED TV combines processing power with beautiful OLED picture and a sleek design to bring in a new standard of home entertainment. The X1 Extreme processor up converts your content to near-4K HDR quality, bringing stunning contrast and absolute blacks to your favorite shows and movies.
feature_bullets: PREMIUM 4K HDR: X1 Extreme Processor delivers IMAX quality for an enhanced movie and show experience
OLED IMAGING: 8 million self-illuminating pixels achieve the perfect black for stunningly real color
NO BLUR ACTION: 120Hz refresh rate combined with OLED delivers lifelike, fast moving action scenes
SOUND REVOLUTION: Innovative Acoustic Surface technology emanates crisp sound from the entire screen
SMARTPHONE CONNECTIVITY: Use wifi to sync your Android / iOS devices for Miracast and video SideView
GENIUS TV: Sync with Amazon Alexa or use the built-in Google Assistant to achieve maximum control
IN THE BOX: Smart remote, batteries, power cord, IR Blaster, instructions, setup guide and stand
DIMENSIONS: TV with stand - 57 x 33 1/8 x 10 1/8 inches; TV without stand - 57 x 33 x 2 1/4 inches

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars98 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
